ctu_text: \n**Note 2:** If more number of applications is received than the prescribed quota, pilgrims will be selected by lottery (computerized draw of lots). A waiting list will also be prepared for 10% more people than the quota. In case the selected pilgrim does not go on the journey, the person included in the waiting list can be sent on the pilgrimage. \n**Note 3:** While drawing the lottery, the application of the applicant will be considered together with that of their spouse (if the spouse has also applied for the journey).
